0.title: Wet wipes for removing stains from faucets and metal surfaces
0.description:
• Metal surface cleaner, with any variety of materials and colors, such as faucets, sinks, removes grease and gas stains in the shortest time.
  • bathroom and toilet surface cleaner, polisher and remover of germs, sediments and pollution
  • Quantity: 50 thick sheets
  • Dimensions: 12 x 18 cm
